lblDescription:
You can enter your address here to redefine your password, an email will be sent to this address.
You can find a link in this email which allows you to set a new password.
msgErrorFormat: One or more fields do not meet the required format
msgSucces: Please check your e-mails and follow the link to complete the procedure
msgErreurEmailMultiple: Your login has been found several times in our database, please contact the web team helpdesk
msgErreurEmailNonTrouve: Your login was not found in our database, please check it and retry
msgErreurIdentifiantNonTrouve: Your login was not found in our database, please check it and retry
msgErreurGeneral: An erreur est suvenue at server side.
